subSections.title: Related characters
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|[[顏]]}} ''(Orthodox {{w|traditional Chinese|traditional form}} used in Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau)''
* {{l|mul|[[颜]]}} ''({{w|Simplified Chinese}})''

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: This character is the preferred form used in Japan<!-- Refer 2010 Jōyō Kanji -->, Korea<!-- Refer 2015 Inmyeong-yong Hanjapyo 인명용 한자표 -->, Vietnam<!-- Refer Nom Foundation - No entries exist for 顏 at http://nomfoundation.org/common/nom_details.php?codepoint=984F --> as well as mainland China ''(when used as a {{w|traditional Chinese characters|traditional character}})''.<!-- Refer 2013 通用規范漢字表 -->
